Math

Inline math: \(E = mc^2\)

Display math:

\[ \int_0^\infty e^{-x^2} \, dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2} \]

Quarto Features

  • Citations: Quarto supports citations and cross-references.
  • Math: Render beautiful math equations.
  • Interactive Elements: Include interactive plots and widgets.
